thread.title: Outdoor Living Products Family Of Websites
thread.title_full: Outdoor Living Products Family Of Websites

title: Outdoor Living Products Family Of Websites
text: Questions Business Summary This company was created to give homeowners and contractors an alternative to big box home improvement stores and expensive boutiques by providing high quality outdoor living products at factory direct prices. The company offers products under its own brand name through white label agreements with manufacturers. Some products have specific specifications unique to its brand and as such are proprietary to the company. Having been well established in the industry, its brand is well known, recognized and maintains a reputation of high quality, unique designs. The listing of 12 websites includes the main parent site with a family of individual niche product websites. Each ecommerce site focuses on its niche of the outdoor living product industry offering the company's brand of its product lines. Under its current business model of 65% dropship and 35% stocked inventory, this business has a current inventory value for products on hand of about $150k, requires about 100 sq. ft. of office space with about 1,500 sq. ft. of warehouse space for operations and can easily be relocated. The business is successfully operated by three full-time employees that handle the day to day operations such as sales, purchasing, warehouse, customer service and one part-time person handling clerical accounting. The owner is not involved in the day to day activities but oversees the financials on a monthly basis and meets with the team quarterly to review and set strategic direction. To date this year, sales have already increased an average of 29% over the same period last year! The company is well on its way to surpassing original forecasted sales and has updated its Pro Forma targeting over $2.1M in Sales! Asking: $1.3M + INV SALE PENDING Financials
